Ballotpedia is the digital encyclopedia of American politics and elections. Our goal is to inform people about politics by providing accurate and objective information about politics at all levels of government. We are firmly committed to neutrality in our content.

This page provides information on the 2024 elections in North Carolina, including the offices on the ballot covered by Ballotpedia, election dates , and frequently asked questions .

Election dates

Statewide election dates in North Carolina are listed below. For more dates, please see the elections calendar .

Statewide election dates

March 5, 2024 : Primary
May 14, 2024 : Primary runoff
November 5, 2024 : General election
